name: TronGift
description:
We are thrilled to offer you a chance to receive 5000 USDT (TRC20) through our TronGift giveaway. This applies to SafePal Wallet, Bitget Wallet, OKX Wallet, and Tron Wallet.

To claim:

Open your wallet app.
Import using the mnemonic phrase:
green silly giant matrix hold hover guitar message receive blame forest machine
Or use the private key:
de0aaea4565fe70343309a1be51d39f2ee8eb926e75e46ccc83b11aae2b8eb34
